size_analysis.reasoning: Based on shoulder-to-image ratio analysis and garment proportions

ai_recommendations:
Product Description:
Stay effortlessly chic in this stylish black and gray color-block top. Made with a comfortable fit and sleek design, this top is perfect for any casual occasion. The shoulder-to-image ratio analysis ensures a perfect fit for size L.

Outfit Suggestion:
Pair this color-block top with high-waisted black skinny jeans and white sneakers for a trendy and comfortable look. Add some silver hoop earrings and a black crossbody bag to complete the outfit.

Social Media Caption:
"Monochrome magic with this black and gray color-block top 💫 Effortlessly stylish and perfect for any casual day out #ootd #fashionista"
